text: Ishq In The Air is an Indian Hindi-language romantic drama television series directed by Tanmai Rastogi and written by Akshay Jhunjhunwala, Ayush Sharma, Chiranjeevi Bajpai and Riya Poojary. Produced under BBC Studios, it stars Shantanu Maheshwari and Medha Rana. The series premiered on Amazon MX Player on 20 September 2024. == Cast == * Shantanu Maheshwari as Naman * Medha Rana as Kavya * Vandana Joshi * Brij Bhushan Shukla * Abhishek Sharrma * Sanjeev Vats * Sanjay Motilal Gurbaxani == Production == The series was announced on BBC Studios. The trailer of the series was released on 19 September 2024. == Reception == Amit Bhatia of ABP News reviewed the series. Archika Khurana of The Times of India rated the series 3/5 stars. == References == == Other websites == * Ishq In The Air on Amazon miniTV * Ishq In The Air on MX Player Category:2024 Indian television series debuts Category:2020s Indian television series Category:Hindi-language television series Category:Drama television series
title: Ishq In The Air
